title: M K A Ariyaratne
description: M K A Ariyaratne - Lecturer and researcher in Artificial Intelligence, data science, and meta-heuristic optimization, with expertise in nature-inspired algorithms.

Home.pageTitle: Anuradha Ariyaratne - M K A Ariyaratne
Home.pageDescription: M K A Ariyaratne - Lecturer and researcher in Artificial Intelligence, data science, and meta-heuristic optimization, with expertise in nature-inspired algorithms and swarm intelligence.
Home.pageKeywords: M K A Ariyaratne, Dr Ariyaratne, AI Lecturer Sri Lanka, Senior Lecturer, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Machine Learning, Meta-heuristic Optimization, Nature-inspired Algorithms, Swarm Intelligence, Evolutionary Computation, Genetic Algorithms, Particle Swarm Optimization, Ant Colony Optimization, Artificial Bee Colony, Firefly Algorithm, Differential Evolution, USJ, University of Sri Jayewardenepura, AI Researcher Sri Lanka
Home.title: Anuradha Ariyaratne
Home.subTitle: Senior Lecturer
aboutDescriptions: I am a passionate lecturer and a researcher in the field of computing, specializing in meta-heuristic optimization and machine learning. My research area has mainly comprised of finding promising solutions for different real world optimizations tasks appear in different fields such as Sports, Agriculture, Numerical optimization and many other.

My focus spans a variety of topics ranging from the development of novel meta-heuristic algorithms for optimization problems, the integration of meta-heuristics with machine learning techniques for enhanced predictive modeling, the application of machine learning in hyper-parameter tuning and feature selection, to the exploration of hybrid approaches that combine evolutionary algorithms with deep learning for complex data analysis. In 2019, I was awarded with the President's Awards for Scientific Research, for being among highly impacted 100 research papers in Sri Lanka for the year 2019 under computer science.

Currently I work as a senior lecturer in the Department of Computer Science, University of Sri Jayewardenepura. I earned my PhD in computer science from University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka, under the supervision of Professor TGI Fernando and Emeritus Professor Sunethra Weerakoon.

I'm a fellow of OWSD, founded by UNESCO, from 2022 to present. I am also a life member of SLAAS and SLAAI associations, which are premier organizations of science  and artificial intelligence in Sri Lanka.
From 2018 to 2024, I served as a reviewer for the springer journals; Evolutionary Intelligence and Soft Computing.
Currently I am serving as the Coordinator for the MSc in Data Science and Artificial Intelligence program at the University of Sri Jayewardenepura.
educations: PhD in Computer Science, 2018, University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka.
MSc in Data Science, 2025, Tampere University, Finland.
BSc (Hons) Special Degree in Computer Science, 2012, University of Sri Jayewardenepura, Sri Lanka.

Teaching.pageDescription: I am teaching many subjects in the field of computing, specializing in meta-heuristic optimization and machine learning.
Teaching.title: Teaching
Teaching.description: I teach Computer Science at both undergraduate and postgraduate levels, covering a broad range of subjects. My approach focuses on clarity, engagement, and real-world applications, helping students develop strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Beyond full-length courses, I also conduct short sessions and workshops, making complex topics accessible and practical for diverse learners.
Teaching.subTitle: Courses

Courses.pageDescription: I am conducting many courses in the field of computing, specializing in meta-heuristic optimization and machine learning.

Policy.pageDescription: Privacy policy and data usage policy
Policy.title: Privacy Policy
Policy.introPara1: <bold>M K A Ariyaratne</bold> ("I," "me," or "my") values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what information is collected through this website (www.mkanuradhi.com), how it is used, stored, and protected, and your rights regarding your personal data.
Policy.introPara2: By using this website, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Policy.infoCollectionSubPara1: When you use the contact form on this website, I collect the following information:
Policy.infoItem1: <bold>Name:</bold> To address you appropriately in correspondence
Policy.infoItem2: <bold>Email Address:</bold> To respond to your inquiry
Policy.infoItem3: <bold>Message Content:</bold> To understand and respond to your request
Policy.infoCollectionSubPara2: When you visit this website, certain information may be automatically collected, including:
Policy.autoItem1: <bold>Browser Type and Version:</bold> To ensure compatibility
Policy.autoItem2: <bold>Device Information:</bold> Type of device and operating system
Policy.autoItem3: <bold>IP Address:</bold> For security and analytics purposes
Policy.autoItem4: <bold>Pages Visited:</bold> To understand site usage and improve user experience
Policy.autoItem5: <bold>Date and Time of Visit:</bold> For analytics purposes
Policy.infoCollectionSubPara3: This website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. These include:
Policy.cookiesItem1: <bold>Essential Cookies:</bold> Necessary for the website to function properly
Policy.cookiesItem2: <bold>Analytics Cookies:</bold> Google Analytics, to understand how visitors interact with the site and improve user experience
Policy.cookiesItem3: <bold>Performance Cookies:</bold> To improve site speed and functionality
Policy.cookiesItem4: <bold>Security Technologies:</bold> Google reCAPTCHA, to protect forms from spam and ensure legitimate submissions
Policy.infoCollectionSubPara32: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
Policy.infoUsedSubPara1: I use the information collected through the contact form solely to:
Policy.primaryItem1: Respond to your inquiries and messages
Policy.primaryItem2: Provide the information or services you requested
Policy.primaryItem3: Communicate with you regarding your submission
Policy.infoUsedSubPara2: Automatically collected information and analytics data are used to:
Policy.analyticsItem1: Analyze website traffic and user behavior
Policy.analyticsItem2: Improve website functionality and user experience
Policy.infoUsedSubPara3: I may use or disclose your information when required to:
Policy.legalItem1: Comply with applicable laws and regulations
Policy.legalItem2: Respond to legal processes (e.g., subpoenas, court orders)
Policy.legalItem3: Protect my rights, property, or safety, or that of others
Policy.dataStorageSubPara1: Your personal information is stored securely using industry-standard practices. Contact form submissions are:
Policy.storageItem2: Stored on secure servers provided by trusted hosting providers
Policy.storageItem3: Accessible only to me for the purposes outlined in this policy
Policy.retentionItem1: <bold>Contact Form Data:</bold> Retained indefinitely for record-keeping and future reference purposes, or until you request deletion
Policy.retentionItem2: <bold>Analytics Data:</bold> Retained according to the policies of Google Analytics
Policy.retentionItem3: <bold>Correspondence:</bold> Email correspondence may be retained as long as necessary for record-keeping purposes
Policy.dataStorageSubPara3: I implement reasonable technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and I cannot guarantee absolute security.
Policy.dataSharingSubPara1: I do not sell, rent, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
Policy.dataSharingSubPara2: I may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist in operating this website, including:
Policy.serviceItem1: <bold>Hosting Providers:</bold> Vercel, for website hosting and content delivery
Policy.serviceItem2: <bold>Email Service Providers:</bold> To process and respond to contact form submissions
Policy.serviceItem3: <bold>Analytics Providers:</bold> Google Analytics, to analyze website traffic and user behavior
Policy.serviceItem4: <bold>Security Services:</bold> Google reCAPTCHA, to protect the contact form from spam and automated abuse
Policy.dataSharingSubPara22: These service providers are contractually obligated to use your information only for the purposes of providing their services and to maintain the confidentiality of your data.
Policy.dataSharingSubPara3: I may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests by public authorities.
Policy.accessItem1: Request access to the personal information I hold about you
Policy.accessItem2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Policy.accessItem3: Receive a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used format
Policy.yourRightsSubPara2: You have the right to request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain legal exceptions (e.g., when retention is required by law).
Policy.yourRightsSubPara3: You may withdraw your consent for data processing at any time by contacting me. This will not affect the lawfulness of processing conducted prior to withdrawal.
Policy.yourRightsSubPara4: You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. For more information on managing cookies, visit your browser's help section.
Policy.yourRightsSubPara5: To exercise any of these rights, please contact me at: mkanuradhi@gmail.com
Policy.yourRightsSubPara52: I will respond to your request within 30 days.
Policy.internationalDataSubPara: This website may be accessed by users from various countries around the world. Your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in locations where the website's service providers (including Vercel and Google) operate their facilities. By using this website, you acknowledge and consent to such international transfers of your information.
Policy.childPrivacySubPara1: This website contains educational content related to computer science and is suitable for visitors of all ages, including children. The content is designed for teaching and learning purposes, particularly for undergraduate and postgraduate students.
Policy.childPrivacySubPara2: While I welcome visitors of all ages, I encourage parents and guardians to supervise their children's internet usage. If a child submits information through the contact form, I treat that data with the same care and protection as outlined in this Privacy Policy. Parents or guardians may contact me at any time to review, update, or request deletion of their child's information.
Policy.linksThirdSubPara: This website may contain links to external websites not operated by me. I am not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. I encourage you to review the privacy policies of any external websites you visit.
Policy.changesPolicySubPara1: I reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time to reflect changes in my practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons.
Policy.notificationItem1: The "Last Updated" date at the top of this policy will be revised
Policy.notificationItem2: Significant changes will be prominently noted on the website
Policy.notificationItem3: Continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy
Policy.changesPolicySubPara3: I encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how your information is protected.
Policy.langInterpretSubPara: This Privacy Policy is available in multiple languages for your convenience. In the event of any discrepancies, conflicts, or differences in interpretation between translated versions, the <bold>English version</bold> shall prevail and be considered the authoritative and official version.
Policy.governLawSubPara: This Privacy Policy shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable international data protection principles and best practices. Any disputes arising from this policy will be resolved in good faith through consultation and negotiation.
Policy.contactInfoPara: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, please contact me at:
Policy.contactInfoSubPara3: I will make every effort to respond to your inquiry within a reasonable timeframe.
Policy.acknowledgmentPara: <bold>By using this website, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy.</bold>

Footer.title: Copyright © {currentYear} Anuradha Ariyaratne.
ackDescriptions: I would like to express my deepest gratitude to everyone who has supported me on my journey. A special thanks to my mentors, professor TGI Fernando, emeritus professor Sunethra Weerakoon, professor A S Karunananda and Mr. Duminda de Silva for their invaluable guidance and encouragement. Their insights have greatly shaped my work and career.
Finally, I would like to thank my family for their unwavering support and encouragement. Without them, none of this would be possible.
